name: Loop: Iginahi no Kaikiten
overview: The two young Kodama sisters, Nozomi and Hikari, decided to go for a drive in the countryside, to celebrate the end of Nozomi's brilliant high-school year. They get lost in the woods and are greeted by a handsome young man, who offers to bring them to the nearby mansion, known as the Deer Garden Temple, and to spend the night here. The exciting adventure soon turns into a nightmare, when the inhabitants of the mansion make Nozomi their sex slave... Loop: Iginahi no Kaikiten consists mainly of text accompanied by still pictures; there is no interaction beside a few points during which the player can make a decision (usually of the "to do or not to do something" variety), which might change the following dialogue and unlock different CG.
